channel.title: Client Help?
channel.description: Alright, I'm running a 317 with 474 De-Obs, and etc. But my client doesn't connect to my server when my friend tries. It gets me on just fine, I've edited all the GUI items, and the Client.java items if necessary, is there something I'm leaving out? I've looked all over the forums for the answer, but just finally decided to post about it, if you could help, it'd be greatly appreciated, and if you have teamviewer that'd be even more great, thanks.

item.title: Client Help?
item.dc:creator: @jennifer1 jennifer.
item.description:
@jennifer1 wrote:

Yeah, I’m just going to try and use it on Port 5555.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help?
item.dc:creator: @jennifer1 jennifer.
item.description:
@jennifer1 wrote:

I already have done that, and it’s not really 474 de-obs, sorry, just advanced graphics and the correct godsword stances.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2009, 07:23:00 am[/size][hr]Just found something, would I edit this? It’s in client.java
return new Socket(InetAddress.getByName(Gui.server), i);// sets ip for server when client files is used over gui

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help?
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

how can you run a 317, with 474 deobs ?

EDIT: also make sure that in your client, you changed the ip, to the no-ip you registered with instead of your local host ip .

Read full topic
